docs.abstract: NCAA determines that Connecticut women's basketball coach Geno Auriemma committed a secondary rules violation when he made a phone call to congratulate Little League World Series star Mo’ne Davis, 13-year-old who told reporters her dream is to play point guard for UConn some day.
